pageContent: Introduction: Gay men with prostate cancer (GMPCa) may have differential health-related quality of life (HRQOL) and sexual health outcomes than heterosexual men with prostate cancer (PCa), but existing information is based on clinical experience and small studies.

metaData.source:
Prostate tumor DNA methylation is associated with cigarette smoking and adverse prostate cancer outcomes
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27142338/
